channel.title: What operating system do you use?
channel.description:
What operating system are you using?
I run windows 7 Ultimate 32Bit on my PC and the same on my laptop.
I used to run vista but when 7 came out i just had to get it, Took me a couple of months to save up the £180 to purchase it.. But well worth it.
I didn't like the general feel of the task bar, so i changed it so it doesnt group the tasks so now it looks like a nice vista.. (:
Here's My desktop [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/35cka68.png[/img]
